name: Survivors of the Dawn
description:
Survivors of the Dawn is a run-based roguelike bullet heaven where you create strategic weapon and item synergies to survive the ceaseless hordes. Remember, every step back is a step towards a whole new strategy.

The dawn bubbles with all the mobs but nothing beats outwitting them after a drenching run.



BATTLE OUT OF DAWN

Slaughter your way through marauder mobs. Prepare for an interstellar showdown as the space bounty hunter, where marauder hordes stand between you and the elusive bounties.

SYNERGY HATCH

Level up your bullets, stack your items, and survive at dawn the stronger the sooner. Create laser-sharp bullet synergies, level them up, then max out the weapon classes for unexpected bonus skills.

RUN-BASED ESCALATION

Navigate the extreme, pedal-to-the-metal progression surviving through the total chaos. Start as a bounty hunter with a gun and end at a laser spectacle. You will die a lot. And die more again.

GUNSTORM CATCH

Surround the marauders with your bullet rain as they circle around you. Oh wait... don't leave before you get your bounties.

STELLAR SPRINT AGAINST TIME

Travel through interstellar yet still be done in time for dinner. Face the boundless replayability of a roguelike and the adrenaline pumping threat of permadeath.

Team

indieGiant Games is a micro studio with massive ideas driven by the passion of making bigger to mountingly more fun and core gameplay mechanics oriented games. SotD is the solo-developed first ever PC game of the studio.
